tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ProductionData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  production_date DATE,
  production_quantity INT,
  waste_quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE historical_production_data (
  production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR,
  production_date DATE,
  production_quantity INT,
  waste_quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE manufacturing_processes (
  process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  process_name VARCHAR,
  process_description TEXT,
  process_duration INT,
  waste_reduction_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE production_data ( 
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  production_date DATE, 
  production_quantity INT, 
  waste_quantity INT 
)

CREATE TABLE manufacturing_processes ( 
  process_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  process_name VARCHAR(50), 
  process_description TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE waste_data ( 
  waste_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  waste_type VARCHAR(50), 
  waste_quantity INT, 
  production_date DATE 
)

CREATE TABLE ProductionData (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  production_date DATE,
  production_quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE WasteData (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  discarded_product_name VARCHAR(255),
  discard_date DATE,
  discard_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ProcessOptimization (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  process_name VARCHAR(255),
  optimization_date DATE,
  optimization_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ManufacturingSites (
  site_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE QualityControl (
  qc_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  check_date DATE,
  passed BOOLEAN
)
